description: This file defines a Flutter widget for the sign-up screen of a mobile application. It includes form fields for full name, email, password, a terms agreement checkbox, and buttons for account creation and Google sign-in, styled with custom UI elements and navigation logic.

classes.name: SignupScreen
classes.description: Public widget class representing the user registration screen.

classes.name: _SignupScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the internal state and behavior of SignupScreen.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Releases resources held by text controllers when the widget is removed.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Validates the form, checks terms agreement, simulates account creation, shows snackbars, and navigates back to home.

methods.name: _signupGoogle
methods.description: Simulates Google sign-in process and shows a snackbar.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the sign-up screen, including app bar, form, and buttons.

methods.name: _heroBackground
methods.description: Creates a gradient background widget for the screen.
